title: An Act to prohibit the sale of "energy drinks" to persons under the age of 18

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Murphy of Weymouth, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1908) of James M. Murphy relative to penalties for the sale of energy drinks to persons under the age of 18.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
